abstract: Intel is close to buying fellow chip maker Altera for more than $15 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Friday, the latest sign of consolidation in the semiconductor industry.
snippet: Intel is close to buying fellow chip maker Altera for more than $15 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Friday, the latest sign of consolidation in the semiconductor industry.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Intel is close to clinching a takeover of fellow chip maker Altera for more than $15 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Friday, the latest sign of consolidation in the semiconductor industry.

headline.main: Intel Takeover of Altera Is Expected
headline.print_headline: Intel Takeover of Altera Is Expected as Chip Industry Consolidates

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Quentin Hardy
